00025 #ifndef _BASE_PATHCOMPONENT_
00026 #define _BASE_PATHCOMPONENT_
00027 
00028 #include <base/base>
00029 #include <base/Object>
00030 #include <base/Cloneable>
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace base {
00034 
00035 
00036 class PathComponent : public Object, public Cloneable
00037 {
00038 public:
00039   PathComponent() {}
00040   PathComponent(const String& name) : _name(name) {}
00041   PathComponent(const PathComponent& pc) : _name(pc._name) {}
00042   virtual ~PathComponent() {}
00043 
00044   virtual String className() const { return String("PathComponent"); }
00045 
00046   virtual const String& name() const { return _name; }
00047 
00048   virtual bool operator==(const PathComponent& pc) const { return (_name == pc._name); }
00049   virtual bool operator!=(const PathComponent& pc) const { return (_name != pc._name); }
00050   virtual Object& clone() const { return *new PathComponent(*this); }
00051 
00052 protected:
00053   String _name;
00054 };
00055 
00056 } // base
00057 
00058 #endif
